"); } } return 0;} æ´›è°· P1551 äº²æˆš123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748#include<iostream>using namespace std;const int MAX_N = 1e4;int arr[MAX_N];void initial(int n) { for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { arr[i] = i; }}int find(int x) { if (arr[x] != x) { x = find(arr[x]); } return arr[x];}void merge(int x, int y) { int x_root = find(x); int y_root = find(y); if (x_root != y_root) { arr[x_root] = y_root; } return ;}int main() { int n, m, p; cin >> n >> m >> p; initial(n); while (m--) { int mi, mj; cin >> mi >> mj; merge(mi, mj); } while (p--) { int mi, mj; cin >> mi >> mj; if (find(mi) == find(mj)) { cout << "Yes" << endl; } else { cout << "No" << endl; } } return 0;}
